summary: This is an email chain from August 12, 2019, regarding a request to reconstruct "292 data" for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (BOP register number 76318-054) and to grant him full read access to research full history including SROs. The email indicates coordination to forward data as soon as possible.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email request, identified as inmate 76318-054, for whom "292 data" needs to be reconstructed and full read access granted.

events.title: Request to reconstruct Epstein's 292 data
events.description: An email is sent requesting the reconstruction of "292 data" for inmate Jeffrey Epstein and granting him full read access to research full history including SROs.

keyFacts: An email dated August 12, 2019, discusses reconstructing "292 data" for inmate Jeffrey Epstein (BOP #76318-054).
The request includes granting Epstein 'full read access' to 'research full history including SROs'.
The email indicates data will be forwarded 'asap', suggesting active coordination regarding Epstein's inmate records.
